meanings.definition: The position or status of being a chef.
meanings.sent1: In the restaurant, his chefdom was evident as he expertly prepared each dish.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to reach the highest level of chefdom in her culinary career.
meanings.sent3: His chefdom was so respected that even the pickiest eaters praised his cooking.
meanings.sent4: As the head chef, he ruled over his chefdom with a spatula instead of a scepter.
meanings.sent5: The chefdom of the kitchen was a bustling and aromatic kingdom.

meanings.definition: The domain or realm of chefs.
meanings.sent1: Within the chefdom of the restaurant, each chef had their own specialty.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the diverse chefdom of culinary traditions opened her eyes to new flavors.
meanings.sent3: The chefdom of the kitchen was like a symphony of sizzling pans and chopping knives.
meanings.sent4: In the chefdom of fine dining, presentation is just as important as taste.
meanings.sent5: She felt like a newcomer in the vast chefdom of renowned chefs at the cooking competition.
